ðŸ“– Summary: The repository provides resources for learning Agentic AI development using the Dapr Agentic Cloud Ascent (DACA) design pattern. It focuses on building scalable AI agent systems leveraging technologies like Dapr, Kubernetes, and the OpenAI Agents SDK. The primary goal is to enable developers to design AI agents capable of handling a large number of concurrent users with minimal resources.
